column4: Hey, I am looking to further secure my data, I know you can encrypt the home folder, but how could i go about encrypting my whole drive? I searched Ubuntuforums to no avail
i know you cant with truecrypt on linux there are probbaly a lot of other tools that can, but is there much point of encrypting root as well?
most people dont have special info there
I would like to keep all of my info out of the hands of people that could take it, not just my documents but also what programs I have installed
